thread.title: What exactly is the war on women?
thread.title_full: What exactly is the war on women?

author: Patriot66
title: What exactly is the war on women?
text: Location: Lebanon, TN Posts: 31,435 Example Obama pays his Women Staffers only 70 Cents for every dollar he pays his male employees Hillary Clinton while in the SEnate and State department paid her female staff 23% less then she did the male members of her staff. I searched for a where it was found that a GOP House, Senate member was paying his Female employees less then the male employees. could not find even one. Thanks from webguy4 and Jimgorn
